photosaics

Create beautiful mosaics of your favorite pictures with a few images or photos

Get Started

Beautiful Mosaics of your Favorite Images

In the volatile and fast-paced world we live in today, eliciting a positive emotional response in someone can have a real impact in overall mental well-being. From music, to sports, to timeless memories, we aim to spread positivity and love through beautiful mosaics built everyday.

High Quality

Various configuration options are available to improve the overall quality of your mosaic and ensure maximum impact. Click here to download the high resolution mosaic of Buzz (Georgia Tech's mascot).

Take a Stand

Real social change has historically occurred through widespread acknowledgement, open-minded diaglogue, peaceful protesting, and persistence. Take your stand today and build a mosaic that you believe in. Click here to download the high resolution mosaic of Martin Luther King Jr.

Your Teams

Your favorite atheletes and sports have always yielded a way to escape from reality at least temporarily and come together in solidarity with other supporters. Build mosaics of your favorite atheletes today. Click here to download the high resolution image of Falcons stars Matt Ryan and Julio Jones.

Interested in our app when it goes live? Subscribe to receive updates!
